Blog.post: FORGET HIM BABE *forget his name* *forget his face* *forget his kiss and warm embrace* *forget the love that once was true* *remember now there's something new* *forget the times you spent together* *remember now he's gone forever*&*REMEMBER THAT YOU HAVE ME FOREVER*

a heart is two tear drops upside down
i love you...but not because of who you are but because of who i am when im with you ...:)
love is like a basketball game.....all the boys are players.
